dcterms:description: The ESTER dataset facilitates the development of Machine Reading Comprehension (MRC) models for event-centric QA, containing event-centric question-answers annotated with event semantic relation type labels.
dcterms:title: ESTER

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: SQuAD is a dataset containing over 100,000 questions for machine comprehension of text, focusing on extracting answers from a given passage.
dcterms:title: SQuAD

dcterms:creator: Mandar Joshi
Eunsol Choi
Daniel S Weld
Luke Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: TriviaQA is a large-scale distantly supervised challenge dataset for reading comprehension, designed to test the ability of models to answer questions based on a given context.
dcterms:title: TriviaQA

dcterms:creator: Adam Trischler
Tong Wang
Xingdi Yuan
Justin Harris
Alessandro Sordoni
Philip Bachman
Kaheer Suleman
dcterms:description: NewsQA is a machine comprehension dataset that provides a set of questions based on news articles, aimed at evaluating the ability of models to understand and answer questions from news content.
dcterms:title: NewsQA

dcterms:creator: Qiang Ning
Hao Wu
Dan Roth
dcterms:description: MATRES is a multi-axis annotation scheme for event temporal relations, providing a structured dataset for understanding the temporal relationships between events.
dcterms:title: MATRES

dcterms:creator: Qiang Ning
Hao Wu
Rujun Han
Nanyun Peng
Matt Gardner
Dan Roth
dcterms:description: TORQUE is a reading comprehension dataset focused on temporal ordering questions, designed to evaluate models' understanding of event sequences.
dcterms:title: TORQUE

dcterms:description: EventQA is a dataset for event-centric question answering over knowledge graphs, focusing on the semantic information stored in event-related data.
dcterms:title: EventQA
